headline: SPECTRUM LAUNCHES INVINCIBLE WIFI™, INTEGRATING WIFI 7 WITH 5G AND BATTERY BACKUP FOR CONSTANT CONNECTIVITY
summary: A storm rolls through and your power goes out, but your devices stay connected to WiFi and life keeps moving: working, learning, streaming and gaming continue because of Spectrum's Invincible WiFi™, the industry's first WiFi 7 service with integrated battery and 5G cellular backup. Announced today, Spectrum's Invincible WiFi sets a new standard for reliable connectivity and peace of mind, helping daily life and business operations run smoothly – even when the unexpected happens.
